basics.name: Carson Fu
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

work.summary: Helped manage the school website, school computers and served as a resource for students and teachers with tech help questions
highlights: Organize and manage school-issued teacher and student laptops

work.summary: Supervised preschoolers as they learned and played during their summer fun program
highlights: Watched over preschoolers to ensure their safety
Prepared snacks, learning material, and engaging activities

volunteer.summary: Assistant coach for the boys basketball team at Kaiser High School
highlights: Instill good sportmanship among other values in the youth of Hawaii

volunteer.summary: I founded a club that combined a love for playing card games with giving back to people in our community to whom we are grateful for by writing short notes of appreciation as an entry fee each time are club gathered to play cards and eat food together.
highlights: One person we wrote to was our beloved librarian at Punahou School who was retiring

awards.title: Punahou School President's Scholar
awards.summary: An award given to a handful of well-rounded students of Punahou School who excelled in academics while also giving back to their community in some way.
